Review Text: The food was appetizing and delightful. The service here is incredibly amazing and I really enjoyed the atmosphere. Will probably come back :))

The the five point reviews are totally correct. One of the best, if not the best, indian food experiences I have had, and I spent 3 years living in the curry capital of England (Birmingham). Must try the pani puri! The staff are also very kind and helpful, in particular Loan and Bich. Would definitely come back and recommend to others!

Review Title: Paradise for Indian Veg Food in Ho Chi Minh
Review Text:
Vegetarian Food:
The food is really good and authentic and will ensure your Taste buds are kept intact especially if you are from Delhi. Special Thank to Jitu who ensured food was made to our taste.
Đồ ăn tuyệt vời, phục vụ thân thiện, chu đáo, nhiệt tình, không gian đẹp, có cả khu vực trong nhà và ngoài trời. Đáng để thử cùng gia đình và bạn bè ❤️

Trải nghiệm tại một nhà hàng Ấn Độ thường rất thú vị với nhiều món ăn phong phú và hương vị đặc trưng. Khi bước vào, bạn có thể sẽ thấy không gian được trang trí bằng màu sắc rực rỡ và những họa tiết tinh xảo, tạo cảm giác ấm cúng và thân thiện.

Review Text: Authentic Indian food. Its feels like home made Indian food. Whenever i visit restaurant i am treated very well and food taste also good.

Lần đầu tiên được đi ăn món Ấn, quán ăn không gian đẹp, chill chill, thích hợp cho các buổi họp mặt. Đồ ăn ngon, nêm nếm đậm đà. Sẽ dành nhiều thời gian để quay lại thưởng thức thêm nhiều món của quán.

We had very nice lunch on birthday of my spouse . Taste of food is pure 100% Indian even far far better than india . I suggest that if in Saigon then must visit this restaurant, staff is also very friendly they serve best with great recommendation of food. Love you guys ❤️👍

Review Title: Excellent Indian restaurant in nice part of Saigon
Review Text: Interestingly, when we travel internationally, we often find that Indian restaurants are our “go to” comfort food. This restaurant was superb. The service was pleasant and efficient. Although not experts on foods of India, the dal, chicken tandoori, saffron rice and naan was superb. The restaurant is in a very nice part of Saigon. After dinner, we could take a nice stroll in the area, which was delightful.
The food is delicious and the service is excellent!  Thanks for all the recommendations and service.  The fresh lime soda is fantastic!

Review Text: The food at Dahi was fantastic, and the service was friendly and quick. The ambiance was cozy, and everything was reasonably priced. Highly recommend!
Nhà hàng trang trí đậm văn hoá Ấn Độ, thức ăn ngon hợp khẩu vị, nhân viên rất nhiệt tình, dịch vụ không có gì bàn cãi. Sẽ giới thiệu cho bạn bè người thân.

Review Title: Review for Dahl Handi Indian Restaurant - Ho Chi Minh City
Review Text:
We had a fantastic dinner at Dahl Handi in Ho Chi Minh City! The restaurant's atmosphere was cozy and inviting, which made our experience even better. We ordered Masala Papad, Chicken Tikka Masala, Garlic Naan, white rice, and Rajma, and I must say, the food was absolutely incredible.

Each dish was packed with flavor and truly authentic Indian cuisine. The Masala Papad was a perfect start to the meal—crispy and well-spiced. The Chicken Tikka Masala was one of the best I've ever had, with a sauce that was both creamy and full of flavor. The Garlic Naan was soft and perfect for dipping into the sauce, while the white rice and Rajma complemented the dishes beautifully.

We haven't had such good Indian food in a long time, and Dahl Handi truly exceeded our expectations. The service was excellent as well; the staff was friendly and attentive.

I highly recommend Dahl Handi to anyone visiting Ho Chi Minh City who wants to enjoy authentic Indian flavors. We’re already looking forward to our next visit!

Review Title: Buena comida pero abuso en la cuenta
Review Text:
Muy buena comida india sin duda, aunque los curry son todo salsa.

Lástima que a los precios del menú les añaden un 10% de impuestos, más un 8% de impuestos, más un 3% de servicio (que no habla ingles); en total un suplemento del 21%.

Nunca nos hemos encontrado con un abuso similar en vietnam. EVITAR.

Review Title: NHÀ HÀNG TUYỆT VỜI, VỊ TRÍ ĐẸP
Review Text: Món ăn thật sự tuyệt vời, hương vị giống y như nhà hàng bên Ấn trong chuyến đi lần trước của mình. Một nhà hàng đẹp nằm ở vị trí rất thuận tiện. Quản lý rất nhiệt tình. Trước khi vào nhà hàng, tôi bị mắc kẹt trong cơn mưa lớn và quản lý đã giúp tôi làm khô ráo. Món dùng rất tuyệt vời, được trình bày đẹp mắt và rất ngon miệng. Đồ uống sáng tạo và sảng khoái. Món tráng miệng xuất sắc.
